title: Reflow Oven Controller
description: In a team of four, designed and implemented a reflow oven. Used C++ for a multi-threaded firmware to program a Xinc2 microcontroller, using SPI protocols and a PID controller. Sensed and displayed the temperature, humidity, and progress of reflow curve on an OLED.

title: MoneyMinder
description: Budget and expense tracking app, using an Express.js backend connected to a MySQL server, RESTful APIs Gemini AI and Unsplash, and a responsive React.js frontend. Designed and developed in 10 days.

title: Custom Macropad
description: Currently designing and prototyping a clock with custom LED arrays, ATMega328, shift registers, and a custom PCB based on the Cistercian numerical system.
